overview: Three prospectors divide and bury their gold to safeguard it from warring Apaches. Cue a series of double crosses, triple crosses, chases, and shoot-outs as greed drives the three men to murder and betrayal.
tagline: DEAD MAN'S TREASURE AND A WANTED MAN! Greed for gold was the lure...a gold-skinned woman was the trap!
title: Rider on a Dead Horse
